task.name: tasks.IncreaseResourceNodeProduction
task.description: For an agent to move toward a resource node and increase its production with a specified quantity. Once the resource node is reached, production start. If the resource node is localized in a non accessible urban block, agent stays outside the urban block and activate the production anyway. This mission is active until another mission is issued. When the mission stops, the resource node production returns back to initial quantity of resource.

parameter.name: resourceNode
parameter.description: The resource node to enact on. Production of this node will be increased with specified quantity.

parameter.name: quantity
parameter.description: The quantity of resource used to increase resource node production. If quantity is not issued, default value is set to 100.

stage.label: Moving toward resource node
stage.description: Moving toward the resource node and increase its production.
